  Methods

· getFileDateBundle

Summary  |  Top 
   static DateBundle getFileDateBundle(int vRef, 
                                       int parID, 
                                       byte[] pName)

Returns a DateBundle containing the dates of the given file. Returns null if an error occurs

Parameter Description
vRef the vRefNum of the file
parID the parID of the file
pName the name of the file, as a Pascal string
